name: test_NAF_14_2_0_verify_viewing_comments_on_post
description:
Test Case: NAF-269
    As a user I want to create text or text + image posts to share with the community
    Scenario: Verify viewing comments on a post
    
    Steps:
    1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in
    2. Go to "Community" tab
    3. Click on a comment button for any post
    4. Verify comment section opens
    5. Add a comment
    6. Verify comment is posted successfully
    
    Expected Result: User should be able to view and add comments to posts
descriptionHtml:
Test Case: NAF-269
As a user I want to create text or text + image posts to share with the community
Scenario: Verify viewing comments on a post

Steps:
1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in
2. Go to "Community" tab
3. Click on a comment button for any post
4. Verify comment section opens
5. Add a comment
6. Verify comment is posted successfully

Expected Result: User should be able to view and add comments to posts
statusMessage:
AssertionError: Comment was not posted successfully in community post detail
assert False
 +  where False = <bound method CommunityPage.is_comment_present of <pages.android.community_page.CommunityPage object at 0x7f20179d1900>>('Community comment CJVhvD')
 +    where <bound method CommunityPage.is_comment_present of <pages.android.community_page.CommunityPage object at 0x7f20179d1900>> = <pages.android.community_page.CommunityPage object at 0x7f20179d1900>.is_comment_present
statusTrace:
self = <tests.android.test_14_Community.TestCommunityManagement object at 0x7f20179fa3e0>
setup_and_teardown = <appium.webdriver.webdriver.WebDriver (session="de4de601-9a10-4748-b40f-a3e0522f4376")>

    @allure.story("14.2.0 As a user I want to create text or text + image posts to share with the community")
    @allure.severity(allure.severity_level.BLOCKER)
    @allure.link("https://app.qase.io/case/NAF-269", name="Qase: NAF-269")
    @allure.description("""
    Test Case: NAF-269
    As a user I want to create text or text + image posts to share with the community
    Scenario: Verify viewing comments on a post
    
    Steps:
    1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in
    2. Go to "Community" tab
    3. Click on a comment button for any post
    4. Verify comment section opens
    5. Add a comment
    6. Verify comment is posted successfully
    
    Expected Result: User should be able to view and add comments to posts
    """)
    def test_NAF_14_2_0_verify_viewing_comments_on_post(self, setup_and_teardown):
        driver = setup_and_teardown
        community_page = CommunityPage(driver)
    
        # 1. Click the first comment button
        assert community_page.click_comment_button(), "No Comment button found on community page"
        sleep(2)
    
        # 2. Go to the comment tab and click the write a comment button
        assert community_page.click_write_comment(), "Write a comment button not found"
        sleep(1)
    
        # 3. Input comment text and send
        comment_text = 'Community comment ' + ''.join(random.choices(string.ascii_letters + string.digits, k=6))
        community_page.input_comment_text(comment_text)
        sleep(1)
        community_page.send_comment()
        sleep(1)
        community_page.click_feedback_to_app() # submit feedback for the app
    
        # 4. Assert the comment is posted successfully
>       assert community_page.is_comment_present(comment_text), "Comment was not posted successfully in community post detail"
E       AssertionError: Comment was not posted successfully in community post detail
E       assert False
E        +  where False = <bound method CommunityPage.is_comment_present of <pages.android.community_page.CommunityPage object at 0x7f20179d1900>>('Community comment CJVhvD')
E        +    where <bound method CommunityPage.is_comment_present of <pages.android.community_page.CommunityPage object at 0x7f20179d1900>> = <pages.android.community_page.CommunityPage object at 0x7f20179d1900>.is_comment_present
